description: Job summary log entry DTO schema

sourceRecordOrder.description: Order of a record in imported file

sourceRecordHrid.description: Order of a record in imported file

sourceRecordActionStatus.description: Status of action performed above a record

instanceActionStatus.description: Status of action performed above instance, value MULTIPLE if multiple instances were affected

holdingsActionStatus.description: Status of action performed above holdings, value MULTIPLE if multiple holdings records were affected

itemActionStatus.description: Status of action performed above item, value MULTIPLE if multiple items were affected

orderActionStatus.description: Status of action performed above order, value MULTIPLE if multiple orders were affected

invoiceActionStatus.description: Status of action performed above invoice entity, value MULTIPLE if multiple invoice records were affected

invoiceLineJournalRecordId.description: UUID of journalRecord which keeps data of particular invoice line processing
